statements: SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_sale_amount < 200
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT id, quantity, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT id, quantity, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY date HAVING total_revenue >= 10000;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, forecasted_revenue FROM sales_data INNER JOIN revenue_forecast ON sales_data.date = revenue_forecast.date;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM revenue_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.sale_date, s.sale_amount FROM sales_data s JOIN customer_info c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY s.sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, rf.forecast_date, rf.predicted_revenue FROM customer_info c JOIN revenue_forecast rf ON c.customer_id = rf.forecast_id ORDER BY rf.forecast_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT id, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT forecast_id, date, forecasted_revenue, confidence_level FROM sales_forecast
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA'
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing')
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY forecasted_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, quantity_sold FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM SalesTeams WHERE team_size >= 5;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_category DESC
SELECT team_name, team_leader, team_location, team_size FROM SalesTeams WHERE team_size >= 10 ORDER BY team_size ASC, team_location ASC
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_amount, forecast_type FROM RevenueForecast WHERE forecast_accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY forecast_amount DESC
